content: dragon approximately 16 in long 40 5 cm 12 in 30 5 cm wingspan and 4 in 10 cm tall can be scaled differently with different yarns/hooks requires working in the round sewing and crocheting two pieces together this is my first time actually publishing a pattern rather than writing it just for myself so any feedback on making it more understandable is greatly appreciated this little dude is the inevitable result of a full-force return of my childhood obsession with dragons and the fact that i was travelling he stands quite nicely if his legs are stuffed well and the wings can be floppy or stiff if the arm is stuffed if you would like you can add wire but i am not able to provide instructions for that materials hook size g - 4 25 mm yarn weight - aran/8 wpi in two colors- i used red heart soft stuffing of choice scissors tapestry needle terminology american increase - 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease - this can be any decrease of choice i use an invisible decrease sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet ___ - stitches that are repeated _ - stitch count at the end of the round ___ differing pattern for symmetrical items body row 1 single_crochet 6 in mc 6 row 2 single_crochet increase 3 times 9 row 3 single_crochet around 9 row 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet 3 times 12 row 5 single_crochet increase 6 times 18 row 6-8 single_crochet around 18 - if using safety eyes attach them here as needed to seem symmetrical you can move these further forward or back on the head if desired so long as they are attached before you begin the neck row 9 single_crochet 7 decrease twice 16 row 10 single_crochet 3 decrease single_crochet 3 twice 14 row 11 single_crochet 5 decrease twice 12 row 12 single_crochet 2 decrease 3 times 9 row 13 flo single_crochet around 9 - stuff head row 14-25 single_crochet around 9 - stuff neck periodically row 26 increase around 18 row 27-28 single_crochet around 18 row 29 single_crochet increase 9 times 27 row 30-45 single_crochet around 27 → row 46 single_crochet decrease 9 times 18 row 47-48 single_crochet around 18 row 49 single_crochet decrease 6 times 12 row 50-52 single_crochet around 12 - stuff body row 53 single_crochet decrease 4 times 8 row 54-70 single_crochet around - stuff periodically row 71 single_crochet 2 decrease twice 6 row 72-80 single_crochet around 6 tie off leaving a tail using the tail cinch the end of the dragon tail closed and weave in hind legs x2 row 1 single_crochet 6 in mc 6 row 2 increase around 12 row 3 single_crochet around 12 row 4 decrease 3 single_crochet 6 for other leg single_crochet 6 decrease 3 9 row 5-7 single_crochet around 9 row 8 single_crochet 2 increase 3 times 12 row 9 single_crochet around 12 row 10 single_crochet 3 increase 3 times 15 row 11 single_crochet around 15 row 12 single_crochet
